## Description {#details}

Multimap-like storage for metadata attachments.

### erase() {#aff77859f559a172e1da80d22d2e57896}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool MDAttachments::erase (unsigned ID)">
Remove attachments with the given <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>.

Remove the attachments at <code><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a></code>, if any.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/llvmcontextimpl-h/#l01459">1459</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/llvmcontextimpl-h">LLVMContextImpl.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/metadata-cpp/#l01482">1482</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/metadata-cpp">Metadata.cpp</a>.

### get() {#a60c01a156a538f029c3f1935e642c726}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void MDAttachments::get (unsigned ID, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; Result) const</>}>
Appends all attachments with the given <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> to <code>Result</code> in insertion order.

If the global has no attachments with the given <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>, or if <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> is invalid, leaves Result unchanged.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/llvmcontextimpl-h/#l01440">1440</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/llvmcontextimpl-h">LLVMContextImpl.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/metadata-cpp/#l01455">1455</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/metadata-cpp">Metadata.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getAll() {#a896044d58defe06e09de0f580ec28eb6}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void MDAttachments::getAll (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; std::pair&lt; unsigned, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a> &#42; &gt; &gt; &amp; Result) const</>}>
Appends all attachments for the global to <code>Result</code>, sorting by attachment <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>.

Attachments with the same <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> appear in insertion order. This function does <em>not</em> clear <code>Result</code>.
